name: Madness: Cleanup Detail
description:
This is you:

You ever wonder who has to clean up the mess after every Madness Combat episode? Well, the Janitor of course! And he's had enough. Make your way through Grunts, Agents, and all those who keep making your life a living hell. (This is a very early look of the game. Might drop it, might not. Who knows?)

Controls:
Movement - WASD
Jump - Space
Crouch - Shift
Interact - E
Fire - Mouse 1
Map - Tab
